product_name: Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Barrier Lite Bike Vest - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Barrier Lite Bike Vest is super lightweight and designed to pack into your pocket. Pull it out when the weather turns or when you're on a long descent. P.R.O. Barrier polyester fabric provides superior wind protection and water resistance. Full-length zipper lets you regulate body temperature. Elasticized hem and armholes keep vest in place when you're in the riding position. The Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Barrier Lite Bike Vest for men has reflective detailing to increase your visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Pearl Izumi P.R.O. Barrier Lite Bike Vest is super lightweight and designed to pack into your pocket. Pull it out when the weather turns or when you're on a long descent.
